pullRequest.title: DefaultHttpCookiePair#parseCookiePair more strict overflow detection
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
DefaultHttpCookiePair#parseCookiePair doesn't check for overflow when
calculating the value starting index.
Modifications:

Check for overflow when calculating overflow index.

Result:
More robust overflow detection in DefaultHttpCookiePair#parseCookiePair.

commit.message:
DefaultHttpCookiePair#parseCookiePair more strict overflow detection

Motivation:
DefaultHttpCookiePair#parseCookiePair doesn't check for overflow when
calculating the value starting index.

Modifications:
- Check for overflow when calculating overflow index.

Result:
More robust overflow detection in DefaultHttpCookiePair#parseCookiePair.

nodes.bodyText:
While you are here, can you please make this method private?
Btw, are the previous two parseCookiePair method have to be public? They currently used only by HeaderUtils, where HeaderUtils#parseCookiePair is also public. If any of these methods have to be public, can we consolidate them all in one place?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -87,7 +87,7 @@ public static HttpCookiePair parseCookiePair(final CharSequence sequence, int na
 
     static HttpCookiePair parseCookiePair0(final CharSequence sequence, int nameStart, int nameLength, int valueEnd) {

nodes.bodyText: valueStart is always > 0, bcz we do +1

This exception is a bit confusing and doesn't tell what was wrong with the arguments. Consider validating some passed params independently and thow if any of them are incorrect. For example, if nameStart < 0 or nameLength is not positive.
